page.title: 12ATTITUDES/FISHING/CRICKET
page.content: The majority of our sample of 11 to 12 year olds like the area,but would not live there because there are not enough shops or entertainment. If you go{FISHING}on the RIVER MENALHYL you will need to get a license from St.Mawgan Fishing Club.The fish you are likely to catch are trout.They put up a great fight when hooked.The owner of the river is the Reverend Mother of the Lanherne Convent. There is a{CRICKET CLUB}at St.Mawgan.They play friendly matches and the Saturday and Sunday League every year.Last year they were 2nd on the Saturday League and 4th on the Sunday League.They play local teams and teams visiting the county.St.Mawgan's Cricket Club play at St.James Moor in the centre of the village.
